item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.7.0 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for [ Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.7.0|https://downloads.aspose.com/words/jasperreports/new-releases/-aspose.words-for-jasperreports-1.7.0/] Please welcome a new release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. In this release, you will find a number of new features as well as bug fixes. See product’s documentation for details. Starting from Aspose.Words for JasperReports there are 2 versions of jar library (necessary for better support of older versions of JasperReports): for JasperReports 3.7.2 and higher (aspose.

item.title: Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.3.1 Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.Words for JasperReports 1.3.1 This is a maintenance release of Aspose.Words for JasperReports. Working with frames is improved. Headers/footers detection is improved, including that for reports containing subreports. Fixed error “Cannot insert a node of this type in this location”. Minor fixes and improvements.
